mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPER_OPERATOR ( id, vcid, name, username, usernameChangeCount, usernameChangeAble, password, pwdErrCount, pwdUpdateDate, valid, locked, modifyAble, examinePwd, historyPwd, invalidDate, organizationId, mainPostId, lastUpdateDate, createDate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{vcid}, #{name}, #{username}, #{usernameChangeCount}, #{usernameChangeAble}, #{password}, #{pwdErrCount}, #{pwdUpdateDate}, #{valid}, #{locked}, #{modifyAble}, #{examinePwd}, #{historyPwd}, #{invalidDate}, #{organizationId}, #{mainPostId}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{createDate} )

INSERT INTO OPER_OPERATOR_HIS ( id, vcid, name, username, usernameChangeCount, usernameChangeAble, password, pwdErrCount, pwdUpdateDate, valid, locked, modifyAble, examinePwd, historyPwd, invalidDate, organizationId, mainPostId, lastUpdateDate, createDate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{vcid}, #{name}, #{username}, #{usernameChangeCount}, #{usernameChangeAble}, #{password}, #{pwdErrCount}, #{pwdUpdateDate}, #{valid}, #{locked}, #{modifyAble}, #{examinePwd}, #{historyPwd}, #{invalidDate}, #{organizationId}, #{mainPostId}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{createDate} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM OPER_OPERATOR WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:

pwdErrCount = #{pwdErrCount,javaType=java.lang.Integer},
pwdUpdateDate = #{pwdUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},

WHERE
